headline.print_headline: Carl Edwards Leaving Roush at End of 2014 Season
headline.main: Carl Edwards Leaving Roush at End of 2014 Season

docs.snippet: Carl Edwards' 11-year run with Roush-Fenway Racing will end after this NASCAR season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards' 11-year run with Roush-Fenway Racing will end after this NASCAR season.

headline.print_headline: UK Deputy PM Wants Russia Stripped of World Cup
headline.main: UK Deputy PM Wants Russia Stripped of World Cup

docs.snippet: Britain's Deputy Prime Minister wants Russia stripped of the right to host the 2018 World Cup to punish President Vladimir Putin for "belligerent behavior" in the Ukraine crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Deputy Prime Minister wants Russia stripped of the right to host the 2018 World Cup to punish President Vladimir Putin for "belligerent behavior" in the Ukraine crisis.

headline.print_headline: State Media: Car Bomb in Central Syria Kills 7
headline.main: State Media: Car Bomb in Central Syria Kills 7

docs.snippet: A car bomb exploded Sunday in the central Syrian city of Homs, killing at least seven people, the country's state news agency reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: A car bomb exploded Sunday in the central Syrian city of Homs, killing at least seven people, the country's state news agency reported.

headline.sub: "Please stop!" Pope Francis' emotional plea for peace
headline.main: "Please stop!" Pope Francis' emotional plea for peace

docs.snippet: Pope Francis makes an impromptu emotional plea for peace, during his weekly Sunday Angelus prayer at the Vatican. Vanessa Johnston reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis makes an impromptu emotional plea for peace, during his weekly Sunday Angelus prayer at the Vatican. Vanessa Johnston reports.

headline.print_headline: At 60, Newport Jazz Fest Looks to the Future
headline.main: At 60, Newport Jazz Fest Looks to the Future

docs.snippet: Newport Jazz Festival founder George Wein is more interested in where jazz is going than in where it's been as he marks the 60th anniversary of the granddaddy of all outdoor jazz festivals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newport Jazz Festival founder George Wein is more interested in where jazz is going than in where it's been as he marks the 60th anniversary of the granddaddy of all outdoor jazz festivals.

headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Kidnaps Top Official's Wife in Cameroon
headline.main: Boko Haram Kidnaps Top Official's Wife in Cameroon

docs.snippet: A government spokesman says Boko Haram fighters kidnapped the wife of Cameroon's vice prime minister in an attack that also resulted in multiple deaths....
docs.lead_paragraph: A government spokesman says Boko Haram fighters kidnapped the wife of Cameroon's vice prime minister in an attack that also resulted in multiple deaths.

headline.print_headline: Judge Strikes Down DC Ban on Handguns Outside Home
headline.main: Judge Strikes Down DC Ban on Handguns Outside Home

docs.snippet: A federal judge struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying guns outside of a person's home, concluding it violates Second Amendment rights....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying guns outside of a person's home, concluding it violates Second Amendment rights.

headline.print_headline: UniCredit Close to Selling More Private Equity Holdings - Source
headline.main: UniCredit Close to Selling More Private Equity Holdings - Source

docs.snippet: Italy's UniCredit is close to selling a new portion of its private equity holdings after a similar deal in 2013, a source close to the matter said on Sunday, as European banks shed non-core assets to strengthen their capital base....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's UniCredit is close to selling a new portion of its private equity holdings after a similar deal in 2013, a source close to the matter said on Sunday, as European banks shed non-core assets to strengthen their capital base.

headline.print_headline: Israel's Netanyahu Says Hamas Has Violated Its Own Cease-Fire: CNN
headline.main: Israel's Netanyahu Says Hamas Has Violated Its Own Cease-Fire: CNN

docs.snippet: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday the Palestinian militant group Hamas had violated its own offer of a 24-hour humanitarian truce in Gaza....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday the Palestinian militant group Hamas had violated its own offer of a 24-hour humanitarian truce in Gaza.

headline.print_headline: UConn Makes 3-D Copies of Antique Instrument Parts
headline.main: UConn Makes 3-D Copies of Antique Instrument Parts

docs.snippet: Researchers at the University of Connecticut are using medical technology to breathe new life into some antique musical instruments....
